casebody.data:
CONESTOGA WOOD SPECIALTIES CORPORATION, et al., petitioners,
v.
Kathleen SEBELIUS, Secretary of Health and Human Services, et al. No. 13-356. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 26, 2013.

Case below, 724 F.3d 377.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit granted. The cases are consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
